alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Fairfield; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 1:13PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Line of showers with strong winds will impact portions of southwestern New London, southern Fairfield, southern Middlesex, New Haven, Queens, western Suffolk, Kings and Nassau Counties through 215 PM EST... At 112 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers along a line extending from near Southbury to Oakwood. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Islip, Jamaica, Bridgeport, New Haven, Stamford, Flatbush, Waterbury, Norwalk, Flushing, Meriden, Brentwood, Milford, Levittown, Middletown and Wallingford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Fairfield; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven
